snippet.title: God For A Day - Official Trailer | Ghouls 4 Games
snippet.description: In this narrative-based simulation game, you play as the Son of God. Your mission: Decide, bless or condemn city residents. Uncover the person's story through their items and secrets before making decisions. Your choices alter the city's destiny, and impact your followers on social media and revelation on Judgment Day. Check out the God For A Day trailer to see what to expect from this game, coming to PC. A demo for God For A Day is available now.
